can confirm, if you seriously program and don’t use stack overflow I am extremely impressed

It would be nice to see a survey of languages ranked by helpfulness of documentation, or usefulness of basic functions. If you have a high level language that can do a lot, it can solve problems easier kinda, right? So I would think python would be underrepresented maybe a little? I think popularity is best determined by occurrences of language on job postings.
